manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
V31 â€” Changelog

- Removed the annoying like nudge while liking posts or Reels.  
- Brought back Reels pinch-to-zoom for better control.  
- Enabled double-tap forward/backward and tap-to-pause in Reels.  
- Added audio controls directly in the Reels footer.  
- Improved Reels opening speed, especially inside Direct.  
- Enabled a smooth zoom effect when opening Reels from Explore.  

- Stories received multiple AI upgrades including edits, transitions, restyle improvements, and background color updates.  
- Added loading indicators and better feedback during AI operations.  
- Music experience improved across Stories with longer durations, vinyl UI, Spotify reshares, and mid-card enhancements.  

- Direct messages are now smoother with threaded replies, better inbox filters, and improved sharing sheets.  
- Sharing got faster with adaptive sheets, easier reposting, and cleaner layouts.  

- UI and animations feel more polished with smoother transitions, cleaner layouts, and refined buttons.  
- Quiet Mode improvements ensure notifications actually stay quiet when enabled.  

- Fixed crash issues while opening followers/following lists.  
- Fixed multiple stability issues, animation glitches, and performance drops.  
- Cleaned up old flags and enabled several under-the-hood improvements.  

Based on v414.0.0.0.10
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
